short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the Cloud that a site is served from

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The https://runson.cloud service aggregates IP address range manifests published by all of the major cloud providers. This extension uses that service to display the name of the cloud that is serving the page you're currently browsing.

If you are interested in the infrastructure of the Internet and what technologies are used to power the sites that you love this extension will help you explore who powers the Web.
